body.p: Destructions where words or even the number of words cannot be reconstructed have to be represented by the following notation:
“--nQ--“ with “n” as count of the number of destroyed quadrats.
Complete destruction at the end of a line/column: “--Rest der Zeile/Kolumne zerstört--"
Complete destruction at the beginning of a line/column: “--Anfang der Zeile/Kolumne zerstört--"
Complete destruction of the rest of the text: “--Rest des Textes zerstört--"
Traces of signs that cannot be identified: "--Zeichenreste--"
NOTE: Between "--" no hyphens ("-") are allowed, thus write "--4 bis 5Q--", not "--4-5Q--".
